title: Do you dream in first person POV or third person? - Quora

response.answer_text: I've had both, first person as well as third person.I've also had mixed POV, which is similar to an out of body experience. Here I am moving through the dream in first person but can also see myself still sleeping, in third person.I've also had omnipresent POV, where I am not participating in the dream but observing the dream as if I was watching a full blown movie, full narrative story, including sound, cutaways and closeups.All this besides lucid dreams and aware dreams. I lead a very fascinating, to myself, nightlife.

Yes. I have another post that you may want to read up on. I can have dreams that is a still “flash” of the future. One was fulfilled this morning. I can also have weird dreams that have to do with time and such, like a 3 second lag room.
My POV in dreams is often interchangeable. It normally has movie cinematography, or just plain 1st person.
